ISSUE.TITLE: [Kanban] Shared view shows empty page
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Please confirm if bug report does NOT exists already ? - [X] I confirm there is no existing issue for this ### Steps to reproduce ? - Share view option is enabled; accessing link shows an empty page - Option to configure `download` during share view menu creation is not available ### Desired Behavior - Shared kanban view - Option to disable CSV download in shared view ### Project Details In development ### Attachements _No response_

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: feat(nc-gui): disable some actions for share kanban view
